TalentsTiers.Name: Enhancing Totems
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the effect of your Strength of Earth and Flametongue Totems by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Earths Grasp
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the health of your Stoneclaw Totem by [@value]% and the radius of your Earthbind Totem by [@value2]% and reduces the cooldown of both totems by [@value3]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Ancestral Knowledge
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your intellect by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Guardian Totems
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the amount of armor increased by your Stoneskin Totem [@value]% and reduces the cooldown of your Grounding Totem by [@value2] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Thundering Strikes
TalentsTiers.Description: Improves your chance to get a critical strike with all spells and attacks by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Ghost Wolf
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the cast time of your Ghost Wolf spell by [@value] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Shields
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the damage done by your Lightning Shield orbs by [@value]%, increases the amount of mana gained from your Water Shield orbs by [@value2]% and increases the amount of healing done by your Earth Shield orbs by [@value3]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Elemental Weapons
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the damage caused by your Windfury Weapon effect by [@value]% increases the spell damage on your Flametongue Weapon by [@value2]% and increases the bonus healing on your Earthliving Weapon by [@value3]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Shamanistic Focus
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the mana cost of your Shock spells by 45%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Anticipation
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your chance to dodge by an additional [@value]%, and reduces the duration of all Disarm effects used against you by [@value2]%. This does not stack with other Disarm duration reducing effects.

TalentsTiers.Name: Flurry
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your melee attack speed by [@value]% for your next 3 swings after dealing a critical strike.

TalentsTiers.Name: Toughness
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your Stamina by [@value]%, and reduces the duration of movement slowing effects on you by [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Windfury Totem
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the melee haste granted by your Windfury totem by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Spirit Weapons
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the damage caused by your Frostbrand Weapon and Windfury Weapon effect by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Mental Dexterity
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your Attack Power by [@value]% of your intellect.

TalentsTiers.Name: Unleashed Rage
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your expertise by [@value] and increase all party and raid members attack power by [@value2]% if within 100 yards of the Shaman.

TalentsTiers.Name: Weapon Mastery
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the damage you deal with all weapons by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Frozen Power
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the damage done by your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, Lava Lash and Shock spells by [@value]% on targets that are affected by your Frostbrand Attack effect, and your Frost Shock has a [@value2]% chance to root the target in ice for 5 sec. when used on targets at or further than 15 yards from you.

TalentsTiers.Name: Dual Wield Specialization
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your chance to hit while dual wielding by an additional [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Dual Wield
TalentsTiers.Description: Allows one-hand and off-hand weapons to be equipped in the off-hand.

TalentsTiers.Name: Stormstrike
TalentsTiers.Description:
6% of base mana
melee range

Instant Cast
8 sec cooldown

Instantly attack with both weapons. In addition, the next 4 sources of Nature damage dealt to the target from the Shaman are increased by 20%. Lasts 12 sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Static Shock
TalentsTiers.Description: You have a [@value]% chance to hit your target with a Lightning Shield Orb charge when you deal damage with melee attacks and abilities, and your Lightning Shield gains [@value2] additional charges.

TalentsTiers.Name: Lava Lash
TalentsTiers.Description:
3% of base mana
melee range

Instant
6 sec cooldown

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Stormstrike
TalentsTiers.Description: When you Stormstrike you have a [@value]% chance to immediatly grant you [@value2]% of your base mana.

TalentsTiers.Name: Mental Quickness
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the mana cost of your instant cast Shaman spells by [@value]% and increases your spell power by an amount equal to [@value2]% of your attack power.

TalentsTiers.Name: Shamanistic Rage
TalentsTiers.Description:
Instant
2 min cooldown

Reduces all damage taken by 30% and gives your successful melee attacks a chance to regenerate mana equal to 30% of your attack power. This spell is usable while stunned. Lasts 15 sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Earthen Power
TalentsTiers.Description: Your Earthbind Totem has a [@value]% chance to also remove all snare effects from you and nearby friendly targets when it pulses.

TalentsTiers.Name: Maelstrom Weapon
TalentsTiers.Description: When you deal damage with a melee weapon, you have a chance[@value] to reduce the cast time of your next Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, Lesser Healing Wave, Chain Heal or Healing Wave Spell by [@value2]%. Stacks up to 5 times. Lasts 30 seconds. This can only be used with shaman weapons.

TalentsTiers.Name: Feral Spirit
TalentsTiers.Description:
10% of base mana
Instant
3 min cooldown

Summons two Spirit Wolves under the command of the Shaman, lasting 45 sec. This ability is usable while shapeshifted.
